actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1201 of title 18 of the United States Code to impose penalties on the acceptance of a benefit extorted through kidnaping and on assisting in the distribution of such a benefit.

summary.text: Imposes penalties on the acceptance of a benefit extorted through kidnaping and on assisting in the distribution of such a benefit.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1201 of title 18 of the United States Code to impose penalties on the acceptance of a benefit extorted through kidnaping and on assisting in the distribution of such a benefit.
